title.rendered: How to use ChatGPT without an account is extremely easy, you should see the article right away

content.rendered:
ChatGPT is an artificial intelligence (AI) based virtual assistant tool developed by OpenAI. ChatGPT is one of the smartest virtual assistants to date. And now, ChatGPT can be used on phones and computers. However, registering for an account is always a barrier for people to use this virtual assistant, isn’t it? So here’s how to use ChatGPT without an account.

How to use ChatGPT without an account

Step 1: First, visit the link on the side to install the Merlin utility> Click Add to Chrome to download the utility to your device. Link to install the Merlin utility Step 2: After installing the utility, at any website, press Ctrl + M to appear the Merlin dialog box > Ask a question above and press Enter to receive the answer at the bottom. below So I showed you how to use ChatGPT without an account. Thank you for taking a moment to view my post. If you find it interesting, please give me a like, a share and don’t forget to leave a comment below.
